item.title: Configuring your Urbit Bitcoin wallet
item.description: The day has finally arrived: May 27 saw a major update to Urbit, and the public release of a bitcoin wallet and the ability to send and receive payments. Your ship provides an identity layer on top of bitcoin – you can tell your planet to send money to ~sampel-palnet, and Urbit takes care of the rest. Think CashApp – enter a handle, send money – but you own the whole stack.
